name: Wood Boy
description:
MOVE : ASDW 

JUMP : SPACE

Resource Status : T

Mining : CTRL or Y

Menu : ESC

This game is for a submission for Global Game Jam 2023.

Woodboy, the brave adventurer, sets out on a quest to gather precious resources from the land and deliver them to the great tree. With every step, he braves through treacherous terrain, dodging danger at every turn. With but a flick of the wrist, Woodboy can unleash the power of his muscles, soaring through the air with a mighty jump, powered by the magic of the "SPACE" key. His eyes are ever vigilant, for danger lurks at every corner. But fear not, for Woodboy is equipped with the knowledge of resource gathering. By pressing the "T" key, he can check the status of his precious hoard, and with a fierce shout, he unleashes the might of his magic pickaxe, wielding it with the power of the "CTRL" or "Y" key. And so, Woodboy journeys forth, guided by the strength of his arms and the wisdom of his keys, determined to bring his bounty to the great tree.

TEAM : TAZ (GLOBAL GAME JAM 2023)

André Miranda

Teemu Spoof

Junhee Kim
